ProteinName	Adenosine receptor A3
GeneName	ADORA3
Length	318
Function	Receptor for adenosine. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which inhibits adenylyl cyclase (PubMed:8234299).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
